title: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: When opening the JDBC Data Set Editor for a SQL Query, the entire schema is loaded immediately, causing a delay in the user interface.
EB: The expected behavior is to defer the loading of the tree until the user either expands the tree or applies a filter. This would improve the loading time and user experience.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor for a SQL Query.
2. Observe that the entire schema is loaded without any user interaction, causing a delay.
